media-browser.local_media_files: Place your video, audio and image files in the media directory to be able to browse and play them in the browser or on supported media players.

media-browser.setup_local_help: Check the {documentation} on how to setup local media.

voice_command.label_voice: Type and press 'Enter' or tap the microphone to speak

restored.not_provided: This entity is currently unavailable and is an orphan to a removed, changed or dysfunctional integration or device.
restored.remove_intro: If the entity is no longer in use, you can clean it up by removing it.
restored.confirm_remove_text: Are you sure you want to remove this entity?

entity_registry.no_unique_id: This entity does not have a unique ID, therefore its settings cannot be managed from the UI. See the {faq_link} for more detail.

editor.name: Namnoverskriding
editor.icon_error: Icons should be in the format 'prefix:iconname', e.g. 'mdi:home'
editor.unavailable: Denne eininga er for augeblinken ikkje tilgjengeleg.
editor.enabled_description: Dekativere oppføringar kjem ikkje til å bli lagt til i Home Assistant
editor.enabled_delay_confirm: The enabled entities will be added to Home Assistant in {delay} seconds
editor.enabled_restart_confirm: Restart Home Assistant to finish enabling the entities
editor.confirm_delete: Er du sikker på at du vil slette denne oppføringa?
editor.note: Merk: dette fungerer kanskje ikkje med alle integrasjonane.

helper_settings.platform_not_loaded: The {platform} integration is not loaded. Please add it to your configuration either by adding 'default_config:' or ''{platform}:''.
helper_settings.yaml_not_editable: The settings of this entity cannot be edited from the UI. Only entities set up from the UI are configurable from the UI.

input_datetime.mode: What do you want to input

counter.restore: Restore the last known value when Home Assistant starts

config_entry_system_options.title: Systemval
config_entry_system_options.enable_new_entities_description: Dersom denne er deaktivert, kjem ikkje nyoppdaga oppføringar til å bli automatisk lagt til i Home Assistant.

services.reconfigure: Konfigurer ZHA-eininga (heal device) på nytt. Bruk dette om du har problem med eininga. Dersom eininga går på batteri, ver sikker på at den er vaken og tek i mot kommandar når du brukar denne tenesta.
services.updateDeviceName: Gje eininga eit tilpassa namn i einingsregisteret.
services.zigbee_information: View the Zigbee information for the device.

confirmations.remove: Er du sikker på at du vil fjerne eininga?

mqtt_device_debug_info.title: {device} debug info
mqtt_device_debug_info.deserialize: Attempt to parse MQTT messages as JSON

notification_drawer.click_to_configure: Klikk på knappen for å konfigurere {entity}
notification_drawer.title: Varsler

notification_toast.connection_lost: Tilkopling mista. Prøver å kople til på nytt..
notification_toast.starting: Home Assistant held på å starte. Alt er ikkje tilgjengeleg før den er ferdig starta.

cards.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this card?

empty_state.title: Velkommen heim
empty_state.no_devices: Denne sida let deg ta kontroll på einingane dine, men det ser ut til at du ikkje har sett opp noko endå. Gå til integrasjonssida for å setje i gang.

safe-mode.description: Home Assistant ran into trouble while loading your configuration and is now running in safe mode. Take a look at the error log to see what went wrong.

starting.description: Home Assistant held på å starte. Ver vennleg og vent.
starting.header: Home Assistant held på å starte...

unused_entities.title: Ubrukte oppføringar
unused_entities.available_entities: These are the entities that you have available, but are not in your Lovelace UI yet.
unused_entities.select_to_add: Select the entities you want to add to a card and then click the add card button.

add_entities.yaml_unsupported: You cannot use this function when using Lovelace UI in YAML mode.
add_entities.generated_unsupported: You can only use this function when you have taken control of the Lovelace UI.

views.confirm_delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view?
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards: Deleting this view will also remove the cards
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view? The view contains {number} cards that will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

reload_resources.refresh_body: You have to refresh the page to complete the reload. Do you want to refresh now?

raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_title: Are you sure you want to remove your Lovelace UI configuration?
raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_text: We will automatically generate your Lovelace UI views with your areas and devices if you remove your Lovelace UI configuration.
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_changes: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to exit?
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_comments: Your configuration contains comment(s), these will not be saved. Do you want to continue?
raw_editor.resources_moved: Resources should no longer be added to the Lovelace configuration but can be added in the Lovelace config panel.

edit_lovelace.explanation: Denne tittelen vert vist over alle visningane dine i Lovelace
edit_lovelace.title: Title

visibility.select_users: Select which users should see this view in the navigation

edit_badges.panel_mode: These badges will not be displayed because this view is in "Panel Mode".

edit_card.pick_card: Vel kortet du vil legge til.
edit_card.pick_card_view_title: Which card would you like to add to your {name} view?
edit_card.unsaved_changes: Du har endringar som ikkje er lagra
edit_card.confirm_cancel: Er du sikker på at du vil avbryte?

move_card.header: Choose a view to move the card to

suggest_card.header: We created a suggestion for you

save_config.para: Som standard kjem Home Assistant til å vedlikehalde brukargrensesnittet, og oppdatere det når nye oppføringar eller Lovelace-komponentar vert tilgjengelege. Dersom du tek kontroll, vil vi ikkje lenger kunne lage dette til automatisk for deg.
save_config.para_sure: Er du sikker på at du vil ta kontroll over brukergrensesnittet ditt?
save_config.yaml_mode: You are using YAML mode for this dashboard, which means you cannot change your Lovelace config from the UI. If you want to manage this dashboard from the UI, remove 'mode: yaml' from your Lovelace configuration in 'configuration.yaml.'.
save_config.yaml_control: To take control in YAML mode, create a YAML file with the name you specified in your config for this dashboard, or the default 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
save_config.yaml_config: To help you start here is the current config of this dashboard:

migrate.para_no_id: Dette elementet har ikkje ein ID. Ver vennleg og legg til ein ID til dette elementet i "ui-lovelace.yaml"-fila di.
migrate.para_migrate: Home assistant kan legge til ID-ar til alle korta og sidene dine automatisk for deg ved å trykke "Overfør konfigurasjon"-knappen.

action-editor.editor_service_data: Service data can only be entered in the code editor

alarm-panel.name: Alarm Panel
alarm-panel.description: The Alarm Panel card allows you to Arm and Disarm your alarm control panel integrations.

calendar.name: Calendar
calendar.description: The Calendar card displays a calendar including day, week and list views

conditional.name: Conditional
conditional.description: The Conditional card displays another card based on entity states.
conditional.condition_explanation: Kortet vil visast når alle føresetnadene under er oppfylt.

entities.name: Oppføringar
entities.description: Oppføringskortet er den vanlegaste korttypen. Den kan gruppere ting inn i lister.
entities.edit_special_row: View the details of this row by clicking the edit button

entity.name: Oppføring
entity.description: The Entity card gives you a quick overview of your entity’s state.

button.name: Knapp
button.description: Knappekortet let deg legge til knappar som kan uføre oppgåver.
button.default_action_help: The default action depends on the entity's capabilities, it will either be toggled or the more info will be shown.

entity-filter.name: Entity Filter
entity-filter.description: Oppføringsfilterkortet let deg definere ei liste med oppføringar som du vil vise berre når dei har ein spesiell tilstand.

gauge.name: Gauge
gauge.description: Målarkortet er eit enkelt kort som let deg visuelt sjå sensordata.

glance.name: Glance
glance.description: Gløttekortet er nyttig dersom du vil gruppere fleire sensorar i ei kompakt oversikt.

grid.name: Grid
grid.description: The Grid card allows you to show multiple cards in a grid.

logbook.name: Logbook
logbook.description: The Logbook card shows a list of events for entities.

history-graph.name: History Graph
history-graph.description: Historiekortet let deg vise ein graf for kvar opplista oppføring.

horizontal-stack.name: Horizontal Stack
horizontal-stack.description: Horisontalstablekortet let deg stable kort saman horisontalt, slik at dei alltid står ved sidan av kvarandre i same rom som ei kolonne.

humidifier.name: Humidifier
humidifier.description: The Humidifier card gives control of your humidifier entity. Allowing you to change the humidity and mode of the entity.

iframe.name: iFrame
iframe.description: Websidekortet let deg vise favorittwebsida di rett inn i Home Assistant

light.name: Light
light.description: Lyskortet gjer slik at du kan endre lysstyrka til eit lys.

generic.manual_description: Vil du legge til eit tilpassa kort eller vil du berre skrive yaml manuelt?
generic.name: Namn
generic.title: Title

map.name: Map
map.description: Kartkortet som let deg vise oppføringar på eit kart.

markdown.name: Markdown
markdown.description: The Markdown card is used to render Markdown.

media-control.name: Media Control
media-control.description: The Media Control card is used to display media player entities on an interface with easy to use controls.

picture.name: Picture
picture.description: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to call a service.

picture-elements.name: Picture Elements
picture-elements.description: The Picture Elements card is one of the most versatile types of cards. The cards allow you to position icons or text and even services! On an image based on coordinates.

picture-entity.name: Picture Entity
picture-entity.description: The Picture Entity card displays an entity in the form of an image. Instead of images from URL, it can also show the picture of camera entities.

picture-glance.name: Picture Glance
picture-glance.description: The Picture Glance card shows an image and corresponding entity states as an icon. The entities on the right side allow toggle actions, others show the more information dialog.

plant-status.name: Plant Status
plant-status.description: The Plant Status card is for all the lovely botanists out there.

sensor.name: Sensor
sensor.description: The Sensor card gives you a quick overview of your sensors state with an optional graph to visualize change over time.

shopping-list.name: Shopping List
shopping-list.description: The Shopping List card allows you to add, edit, check-off, and clear items from your shopping list.
shopping-list.integration_not_loaded: Dette kortet krev at "shopping_list"-integrasjonen er sett opp.

thermostat.name: Thermostat
thermostat.description: The Thermostat card gives control of your climate entity. Allowing you to change the temperature and mode of the entity.

vertical-stack.name: Vertical Stack
vertical-stack.description: The Vertical Stack card allows you to group multiple cards so they always sit in the same column.

weather-forecast.name: Weather Forecast
weather-forecast.description: The Weather Forecast card displays the weather. Very useful to include on interfaces that people display on the wall.

panel_mode.title: Panel Mode?
panel_mode.description: This renders the first card at full width. Other cards in this view as well as badges will not be rendered.
panel_mode.warning_multiple_cards: Denne sida har fleire enn eitt kort, men panelvisning kan berre vise eitt kort i gangen.

warning.starting: Home Assistant held på å starte. Det kan hende at alt ikkje er tilgjengeleg endå.

changed_toast.message: Lovelace-konfigurasjonen vart oppdatert. Ønsker du å friske opp?

external_panel.question_trust: Do you trust the external panel {name} at {link}?
external_panel.complete_access: It will have access to all data in Home Assistant.
external_panel.hide_message: Check docs for the panel_custom component to hide this message
